mutants.code:
def calculate_licks(environment_conditions):
    base_licks = 253
    toughest_challenge = None
    max_impact = 0
    total_licks = base_licks
    for (condition, impact) in environment_conditions.items():
        total_licks += impact
        if impact > max_impact:
            max_impact = impact
            toughest_challenge = condition
    result = f'It took {total_licks} licks to get to the tootsie roll center of a tootsie pop.'
    if toughest_challenge:
        result += f' The toughest challenge was {toughest_challenge}.'
    return result

def calculate_licks(environment_conditions):
    base_licks = 252
    toughest_challenge = None
    max_impact = 0
    total_licks = base_licks
    for (condition, impact) in environment_conditions.items():
        total_licks -= impact
        if impact > max_impact:
            max_impact = impact
            toughest_challenge = condition
    result = f'It took {total_licks} licks to get to the tootsie roll center of a tootsie pop.'
    if toughest_challenge:
        result += f' The toughest challenge was {toughest_challenge}.'
    return result
